Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 66th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Daniel Helmer (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/2015, off Andrew Hutzler (NY)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2015, hitting .467 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2015, hitting .571 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2016, hitting .351 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Kansas City on 5/29/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/8/2017 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/13/2018 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
10/23/2019: Signed a contract extension with Boston, $11,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 6/3/2020 with a Fractured Knee, out for 6 weeks...
